in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom

Class SingleActionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom.ActionBuilder
      • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom.SingleActionBuilder

  • public class SingleActionBuilder
extends ActionBuilder
    It's a concrete implementation of ActionBuilder abstract class. This is a customize dialog box with single button.
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    8/30/2016

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.widget.Button btnSubmit
      It is much like "Positive" button of default dialog interface.
